name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Albert Thomas MALLIA, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Albert Thomas MALLIA, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 22nd day of December, 1997, the Petition For Allowance of Appeal is herewith non-prossed for failure to make service on respondent. Pa.R.A.P., Rule 3115.

casebody.head_matter:
703 A.2d 708
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Albert Thomas MALLIA, Petitioner.
No. 662 M.D. Allocatur Docket 1997.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 22, 1997.
